title: Guitarist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, you may play a song at someone's house. You will redirect all their visitors to you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After an evil player is hanged, tonight your songs will speak of the victories of the Countryfolk in the face of struggle. Your hymns motivate listeners so much that you can choose a second target, redirecting all listeners of the song to the second player's house.
- After a Countryfolk player is hanged, tonight your songs will be be filled with regret at the failures of the Countryfolk. Your melody disarms listeners, roleblocking them if they would attempt to attack you.
- Roleblock and control immune

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - At night, you may play a song at someone's house. You will redirect all their visitors to you. One use before your old guitar strings snap.

desc:
Post 4723
*I been sitting at these crossroads since midnight. Done sold my soul to the devil hisself to teach me to play the guitar.*
